name: ELT
tagline: English Language Teaching - Trying to create a useful archive of all of the resources I've generated since I started teaching English as a foreign or second language in '08.
body: I'm trying to create a useful archive of all of the resources I've generated since I started teaching English as a foreign or second language in '08. - Charlie Danoff @danoff on Twitter
